title: Essence Mascara Lash Princess
description: The Essence Mascara Lash Princess is a popular mascara known for its volumizing and lengthening effects. Achieve dramatic lashes with this long-lasting and cruelty-free formula.

title: Eyeshadow Palette with Mirror
description: The Eyeshadow Palette with Mirror offers a versatile range of eyeshadow shades for creating stunning eye looks. With a built-in mirror, it's convenient for on-the-go makeup application.

title: Powder Canister
description: The Powder Canister is a finely milled setting powder designed to set makeup and control shine. With a lightweight and translucent formula, it provides a smooth and matte finish.

title: Red Lipstick
description: The Red Lipstick is a classic and bold choice for adding a pop of color to your lips. With a creamy and pigmented formula, it provides a vibrant and long-lasting finish.

title: Red Nail Polish
description: The Red Nail Polish offers a rich and glossy red hue for vibrant and polished nails. With a quick-drying formula, it provides a salon-quality finish at home.

title: Calvin Klein CK One
description: CK One by Calvin Klein is a classic unisex fragrance, known for its fresh and clean scent. It's a versatile fragrance suitable for everyday wear.

title: Chanel Coco Noir Eau De
description: Coco Noir by Chanel is an elegant and mysterious fragrance, featuring notes of grapefruit, rose, and sandalwood. Perfect for evening occasions.

title: Dior J'adore
description: J'adore by Dior is a luxurious and floral fragrance, known for its blend of ylang-ylang, rose, and jasmine. It embodies femininity and sophistication.

title: Dolce Shine Eau de
description: Dolce Shine by Dolce & Gabbana is a vibrant and fruity fragrance, featuring notes of mango, jasmine, and blonde woods. It's a joyful and youthful scent.

title: Gucci Bloom Eau de
description: Gucci Bloom by Gucci is a floral and captivating fragrance, with notes of tuberose, jasmine, and Rangoon creeper. It's a modern and romantic scent.

title: Rouge Allure Velvet
description: A limited-edition CHANEL ROUGE ALLURE VELVET lipstick from the Holiday 2025 collection, featuring two iconic shades — Rouge Vie and Abstrait — with a soft matte finish and elegant black-gold packaging.

title: PNJ My First Diamond 14K White Gold Diamond Ring
description: A timeless PNJ creation crafted in 14K white gold, featuring a brilliant-cut diamond that radiates pure elegance. The 'My First Diamond' ring embodies sophistication and emotional value — a perfect symbol of love, success, or new beginnings.

title: V-neck two-strap skirt
description: The soft woven calf-length skirt features a double-layered V-neckline, adjustable pasta-style shoulder straps, a sunken box glass in front, and a twisted skirt. Side Zipper.

title: Monogram Moccasin in Lamb Leather
description: Luxurious Italian lamb leather moccasins featuring MCM’s iconic Visetos monogram print, leather laces, and a smooth leather sole — a modern, elegant twist on the classic design.

title: PNJSilver Handshake
description: A sleek and elegant PNJSilver sterling silver bracelet featuring a delicate handshake-inspired design with sparkling stones. Perfect for adding a touch of sophistication and modern charm to any outfit.

title: Chanel Chance Eau Splendide
description: Chanel Chance Eau Splendide is a captivating fruity-floral fragrance blending raspberry, rose, violet, and geranium with hints of mint, iris, cedar, and white musk — a radiant, elegant scent that leaves a lasting, enchanting impression.

title: John Hardy Women's Legends Naga Gold & Silver Dragon Station Chain Bracelet
description: From our Legends Collection, the Naga was inspired by the mythical water dragon that protects the ocean's pearl. Wear facing inward to be bestowed with love and abundance, or outward for protection.

title: Solid Gold Petite Micropave
description: Satisfaction Guaranteed. Return or exchange any order within 30 days.Designed and sold by Hafeez Center in the United States. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Return or exchange any order within 30 days.

title: White Gold Plated Princess
description: Classic Created Wedding Engagement Solitaire Diamond Promise Ring for Her. Gifts to spoil your love more for Engagement, Wedding, Anniversary, Valentine's Day...

title: Pierced Owl Rose Gold Plated Stainless Steel Double
description: Rose Gold Plated Double Flared Tunnel Plug Earrings. Made of 316L Stainless Steel

title: Visetos Slide Sandals
description: Elegant women’s slide sandals featuring MCM’s iconic Visetos monogram canvas upper and a 3D Laurel EVA sole — blending luxury design with everyday comfort and style.

title: Sandals in Lauretos Raffia Jacquard
description: Chic raffia jacquard sandals crafted from Italian textile with calfskin leather trim and gold-tone Bavarian diamond buckles. Finished with a logo-embossed leather footbed for a touch of luxury and comfort.

title: Skywander Lo Sneakers in Lauretos Jacquard
description: Luxurious Italian jacquard low-top sneakers featuring MCM’s Lauretos monogram, calfskin leather trim, and a 3D Laurel rubber outsole — blending heritage craftsmanship with modern streetwear elegance.

title: Moccasin in Metallic Calf Leather
description: Contemporary metallic calfskin leather moccasins crafted in Italy, featuring a unique distressed finish, decorative leather laces, and a smooth leather sole — a bold, modern take on timeless elegance.

title: Blazer With Belt
description: A woven blazer with a stand-up neck and a diagonal landing front body with a thin waist belt. Padded shoulders, long sleeves with slits at the wrists and a bag before the incision.

title: Cotton skirt embroidered with lace
description: The calf-length skirt is made of woven cotton embroidered with perforated lace and scallop bears. Elastic waistband with drawstring.

title: Denim Skirts
description: Short skirt in hard cotton denim with a collar, button-down brace and short sleeves. It has an A-shape with exposed seams at the front and back.

title: Pleated two-strap skirt
description: The wrinkled jersey calf-length skirt features a pleated top, a square neckline, and adjustable pasta-style shoulder straps. Shrugged seams at the waist and skirt are plentiful.

title: Trench jacket
description: A woven trench coat with a stand-up collar that ruffles at the back. Buttons along the front torso, hand warming bag with hemming and belt tied at the hips. Delayed shoulders and long arms with adjustable belts and buttons at the wrists. There is a lining. There are both regular and macramé tie belts, offering a variety of versatile combination options.

title: Lace-up chiffon style shirt
description: The see-through chiffon style shirt has a bow tie collar and an open V at the front. Shoulder shredded sewing and balloon long sleeves with buttoned cufflinks. No lining.

title: Bouclé jacket
description: Short jacket in a bouclé weave detailed with accent-colour trims. Features a V-neck, knot-look buttons down the front and welt front pockets. Lined.
